/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a pedestrian's viewpoint on the sidewalk, immersing the viewer in the city's daily life. The street is lined with a variety of buildings, showcasing the architectural diversity of the city. Modern skyscrapers tower over the scene, their glass and steel facades reflecting the overcast sky. In contrast, traditional Chinese-style buildings add a touch of historical charm to the urban landscape. The street itself is a hive of activity, with cars and buses moving along the road, adding a dynamic element to the scene. Overhead, a bridge stretches across the street, connecting different parts of the city. The sky above is overcast, casting a soft, diffused light over the scene. The colors in the image are mostly gray and green, reflecting the blend of modernity and tradition that characterizes Beijing.
